org.assertj.swing.security

Class NoExitSecurityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.SecurityManager
      • org.assertj.swing.security.NoExitSecurityManager

  • public class NoExitSecurityManager
extends java.lang.SecurityManager
    SecurityManager that does not allow an application under test to terminate the current JVM. Adapted from Abbot's NoExitSecurityManager.
    Author:
    Alex Ruiz
